/usr/bin/c++   -O2 -Wall -ffast-math   CMakeFiles/vegas.dir/main.cc.o CMakeFiles/vegas.dir/src/system.cc.o CMakeFiles/vegas.dir/src/atom.cc.o CMakeFiles/vegas.dir/src/lattice.cc.o CMakeFiles/vegas.dir/src/reporter.cc.o  -o vegas -rdynamic -O2 -Wall -ffast-math /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/serial/lib/libhdf5.so -lpthread -lsz -lz -ldl -lm -ljsoncpp -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/hdf5/serial/lib:
